title: Fix game loading failure

requirements.text: Diagnose and fix the critical error preventing the game from loading or opening in the browser

quotes: O jogo ainda não está abrindo ainda corrigir o erro rápido

acceptanceCriteria: The game successfully loads and displays the title screen
No console errors prevent the game from initializing
The canvas renders correctly when entering the game

requirements.text: Verify that the store initialization flow completes successfully without errors
acceptanceCriteria: StoreInitializer component completes without throwing errors
Sectors and products are created successfully
Progress feedback displays correctly during setup

requirements.text: Ensure the GameScene component renders properly after authentication and profile setup
acceptanceCriteria: GameScene loads after completing profile setup
Canvas displays the game grid and elements
HUD elements render correctly on top of the canvas

requirements.text: Fix any backend actor initialization or authentication issues that may prevent game data from loading
acceptanceCriteria: Backend actor initializes correctly with user identity
Store data queries return valid responses
No authentication errors block game functionality

constraints: Fix must restore game functionality without breaking existing features
Maintain mobile-responsive design implemented in previous versions
Preserve user authentication flow through Internet Identity
nonGoals: Redesigning the UI beyond what's needed to fix the loading issue
Implementing Facebook-specific integrations (will be addressed separately)
